I for 1 [sic] do not sneer at Santorum for being out-dated; being old-fashioned can be quaintly attractive or Comforting, as with RoPaul or Pat Buchanan, & in this vein the sweater vests are a strong but ambivalent meme. But those vests to do not I.D. [sic] him as a retro-nerd, since he's the opposite: an anti-science retro-twerp, of the sort that gives Luddites a bad name, & of the sort that Robert Bolt recast Sir Thomas More to avoid). Â
I don't sneer at Santorum - at all. To the contrary - I take his bigotry seriously. He's anti-Blah people; he's legislatively unprincipled; he has pretty much the same view of women that wingers accuse Islam of having; & he wants to repeal of separation of church - his personally-approved version of church, being northwest European post Neandertal Catholic as re-formed by Jean Chauvin (a.k.a. Calvinism, akin to the American variation of Puritanism that led to Burning women as witches & forcing them to wear scarlet "A"s) & state.
People like this are mostly harmless - unless officially empowered, whereupon they tend to do in office exactly what they said they'd do in office when they were out of office. Â
